About

Read about me

I'm Daniel Łagowski and I'm nineteen. I've been programming for about 4 years and now I think it's a perfect time to use what I know to build something incredible with a real team of developers. On this website, You can read about technologies that I learn and projects I've built so that You can decide if I match your team.
